text: Nicktoons Nitro is a video game which is a sequel to Nicktoons Racing and Nicktoons Winners Cup Racing. It features characters from the TV shows: SpongeBob SquarePants, Danny Phantom, The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius, The Fairly OddParents, Invader Zim, Avatar: The Last Airbender, The game was released in August 2008 as an arcade game by developer Raw Thrills. ==References== ==Other websites== * Raw Thrills - Nicktoons Nitro * News Article Category:2009 video games Category:Arcade games Category:Avatar: The Last Airbender games
title: Nicktoons Nitro
